name: Display the detailed costs of the purchase
scenarioId: get_payment_details:Display the detailed costs of the purchase
methodName: Display the detailed costs of the purchase

testSteps.description: Given that the user is on the purchase summary page
When the user displays the purchase details tab
Then the system should display the detailed breakdown of the purchase, including taxes, fees and additional charges

userStory.narrative:
As a user, I want to be able to see the detailed costs of my purchase,
  including taxes and additional fees, so I know exactly what I am paying.

title: Display the detailed costs of the purchase
testFailureMessage: Failed to instantiate class co.com.udea.pagosb.modulopagosb.stepdefinitions.GetPaymentDetailsStepDefinition - this class doesn't have an empty or a page enabled constructor"
